Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
local stillEquipped = true function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Orb = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local healAmount = 25
local infuseAnim
local dropOrb local numberOfOrbs
local greenFire
function spray(key) if key:lower() == "q" and Tool.Enabled then dropOrb = Tool:FindFirstChild("DropOrb") numberOfOrbs = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfOrbs") if numberOfOrbs and numberOfOrbs.Value > 0 then if dropOrb and dropOrb.Value == 0 then dropOrb.Value = 1 numberOfOrbs.Value = numberOfOrbs.Value - 1 end end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
infuseAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.InfuseAnim) if infuseAnim then infuseAnim:Play() end
wait(0.5)
Orb.Transparency = 1.0
if myHumanoid.Health + healAmount < myHumanoid.MaxHealth then myHumanoid.Health = myHumanoid.Health + healAmount else myHumanoid.Health = myHumanoid.MaxHealth end
greenFire = Instance.new("Fire") greenFire.Color = Color3.new(0.1, 0.9, 0.1) greenFire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0.2, 0.8, 0.2) greenFire.Size = 3.0 greenFire.Heat = 1.0 greenFire.Parent = myTorso
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 26.0 wait(5.0) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 wait(1.0) Orb.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(spray) end end
function onUnequipped() if infuseAnim then infuseAnim:Stop() end if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
if greenFire then greenFire:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Orb = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local screenGui
local healAmount = 20
local orbClones = {}
local numberOfOrbs
local dropOrb = Tool:FindFirstChild("DropOrb") while dropOrb == nil do dropOrb = Tool:FindFirstChild("DropOrb") wait() end
function canInfuse(hit, orb) if hit and hit.Parent then if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and humanoid == myHumanoid then healAmount = 20 else healAmount = -20 end if humanoid then if humanoid.Health + healAmount <= humanoid.MaxHealth then humanoid.Health = humanoid.Health + healAmount else humanoid.Health = humanoid.MaxHealth end if myHumanoid.WalkSpeed == 16 then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 26.0 coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(4.0) if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end end)) end if orb and orb.Parent then orb:Remove() numberOfOrbs = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfOrbs") if numberOfOrbs and numberOfOrbs.Value < 8 then numberOfOrbs.Value = numberOfOrbs.Value + 1 end end end end end
function healTheMan() while orbClones and #orbClones > 0 do for i = 1, #orbClones do if orbClones[i] then local timer = orbClones[i]:FindFirstChild("Timer") if timer and timer.Value > 0 then timer.Value = timer.Value - 1 if orbClones[i] then local players = Game:GetService('Players'):GetPlayers() for i = 1, #players do local character = players[i].Character if character ~= nil then local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') if torso and torso ~= myTorso then local distance = (orbClones[i].Position - torso.Position).magnitude if distance < 15 then if orbClones[i]:FindFirstChild("BP") then orbClones[i].BP:Remove() end orbClones[i].Velocity = (torso.Position - orbClones[i].Position).unit * 30 end end end end end else if orbClones[i] then orbClones[i]:Destroy() end table.remove(orbClones, i) end end end wait(0.1) end end
function makeOrb() dropOrb = Tool:FindFirstChild("DropOrb") if dropOrb and dropOrb.Value == 1 then local orbClone = Orb:Clone()
Orb.Transparency = 1.0
local bg = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.cframe = Orb.CFrame bg.P = 100000 bg.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bg.P, 0, bg.P) bg.Parent = orbClone
local bp = Instance.new("BodyPosition") bp.Name = "BP" bp.P = 50000 bp.maxForce = Vector3.new(bp.P, bp.P, bp.P) bp.position = Orb.Position + Vector3.new(0, 3, 0) bp.Parent = orbClone
orbClone.CanCollide = false orbClone.Transparency = 0.0 orbClone.Parent = game.Workspace
local bav = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") bav.Name = "BAV" bav.P = 20000 bav.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, bav.P * 5000, 0) bav.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0) bav.Parent = orbClone
timer = Instance.new("NumberValue") timer.Name = "Timer" timer.Value = 250
timer.Parent = orbClone wait(0.25) if bg then bg:Remove() end Orb.Transparency = 0.0 wait(1.75) table.insert(orbClones, orbClone)
orbClone.Touched:connect(function(hit) canInfuse(hit, orbClone, 1) end) if #orbClones == 1 then coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(healTheMan)) end wait(2.0) dropOrb.Value = 0 end end
dropOrb.Changed:connect(makeOrb)
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
myHumanoid.Died:connect(function() numberOfOrbs = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfOrbs") if orbClones and numberOfOrbs then for i = 1, #orbClones do if orbClones[i] then orbClones[i]:Remove() end numberOfOrbs = numberOfOrbs + 1 wait(0.5) end
end end)
numberOfOrbs = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfOrbs")
screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") screenGui.Name = "OrbsGui" if myPlayer then screenGui.Parent = myPlayer.PlayerGui end frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Name = "TrapContainer" frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.75, 0) frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) frame.Parent = screenGui frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
image = Instance.new("ImageLabel") image.Name = "Trap" image.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=103330347" image.Parent = frame image.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) image.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
text = Instance.new("TextLabel") text.Text = numberOfOrbs.Value
numberOfOrbs.Changed:connect(function() if numberOfOrbs then text.Text = numberOfOrbs.Value end end)
text.Position = UDim2.new(0.75, 0, 0.75, 0) text.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) text.Parent = frame text.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 text.TextColor = BrickColor.new("Earth green") text.FontSize = 7 end
function onUnequipped() Orb.Transparency = 0.0 if screenGui then screenGui:Remove() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
